name: .KUX
summary: Learn about .KUX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If you have already downloaded and installed Youku's desktop or mobile applications, you can open and play KUX files in those apps. If you do not want to install Youku on your computer or mobile device, you can convert a KUX file to a more common video format using FFmpeg. Then, you can play the converted file in the media player of your choice.
